description:
Here's a fantastic opportunity to own an appealing and charming home, perfect for a new home owner, or an investor seeking a high rental return.

The delightful home sitting on a large block of 767m2 displays a warm and welcoming atmosphere and offers bright lounge, adjacent meals area, a lovely veranda offering beautiful views and overlooking the gardens and the inviting pool below.


Equipped with four bedrooms, all with good and almost new carpet, 2 bathrooms, one being ensuite to the master bedroom, whilst the second servicing the other 3 bedrooms and offering bath tub, plus a handy powder room perfectly suited for the visiting guests.

The kitchen has ample cabinets and bench space, a large walk-in-pantry, dishwasher, gas cooking, microwave provision, and a convenient servery to the verandah where you can have your BBQ's at ease whilst enjoying the sun and the views at the same time, and providing direct access from the meals area and the main bedroom is a plus.

The in-ground concrete pool is perfect for the hot Aussie summers, with the undercover area being perfect for entertaining guests, or for sitting outside and enjoy BBQ with family and friends, plus backyard with 2 beautiful mango trees, leaving more than enough room for the kids to enjoy and play.

Other features include:

· Split system air-conditioner in family area plus ceiling fans throughout the entire house

· Security screens in all windows and doors

· Tinted windows

· Solar system

· Front fence and gates keeping the property private and secure

· 3 car garage and a parking spot, ideal for parking caravan, boat, or trailer

· Under the house storage adjacent to the garage plus a "man cave" tool room

· Beautiful, low maintenance landscaped front yard

Located very close to shops and plenty of amenities including Bunnings and Aldi, local schools, sports clubs, medical and childcare centres, and a short drive to Eden’s Landing Train Station, it's easy to see why Edens Landing is such a popular suburb with much growth within the area.

Don't miss this opportunity, Enquire now to book an appointment to view this property.

We have in preparing this information used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained therein is true and accurate but accepts no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect of any errors, inaccuracies or misstatements contained herein. Prospective purchasers should make their own inquiries to verify the information contained herein.

All information contained in the Local Realty Group website is provided as a convenience to clients. All property prices displayed on the Website are current at the time of issue but may change at any time and are subject to availability.

Property Code: 761
